title: sanmArga siddhi
sahitya:
sanmArga siddhi taruvAi dharmavatiyE sadAnanda mukti peravE endAyE


anupallavi

  dhanmArtta kAma mOkSa caturvidha puruSArttam tAngiya jayashakti Ongiya nilai pera


caraNam    aruNAlayattirkku yAttirai senriDum AghAya mIn aNI pOlE karuNaik-kaDal kalakkak- kAdaluDan sellum 
gangai veLLattinaip-pOlE kaviyin kanavinaip-pOlE bhuviyil vaLam perugip-podu nalangaL vaLara
